title.rendered: Are You There God? It’s Me, Margaret

content.rendered:
Directed By Directed by Kelly Fremon Craig.

Written By Written by Kelly Fremon Craig. Judy Blume.

Cast Abby Ryder Fortson. Rachel McAdams. Kathy Bates.

Language English.

Producer Julie Ansell. Judy Blume. Amy Brooks. James L. Brooks. Kelly Fremon Craig. Jonathan McCoy. Colby Pines. Aldric La’auli Porter. Jarin Rossiter. Richard Sakai.

Production Gracie Films. Lionsgate.
